author: weaver
msg: displayPortletNotAvailableMessage() did not take into account the fact that
response.getWriter() may fail if response.getOutputStream() had been called

author: dims
msg: slightly reworked patch from chamil for threadpool

author: ddewolf
msg: Refactoring container services to simplify and standardize the way services are handled.  Introducing optional services.

author: ronnie
msg: - refactored log filters and levels to reside in an array so that names
can be reused after deletion needed for mod_websh, because
otherwise, we run out of names sooner or later

author: jdcasey
msg: Adding '$' as an escape character for variable-syntax which should be passed through.
